Pomodoro Timer is a simple and easy-to-use Google Chrome extension designed to support efficient time management and improve concentration. Based on the Pomodoro Technique, it alternates between periods of focused work and short breaks to maximize productivity.

Features:

1. Simple design: Pomodoro Timer features a clean and intuitive design, making it easy to start using.
2. Notification functionality: When the timer ends, you will be notified through desktop notifications.
3. Free: Pomodoro Timer is completely free and contains no advertisements.

Use the Pomodoro Timer to achieve efficient time management and boost your concentration. It is the ideal tool to enhance your work efficiency and productivity. Install now and experience the power of the Pomodoro Technique!
